ClinicalDocument.title: Initial Public Health Case Report Reportability Response

addr.streetAddressLine: Clinic Bldg A, Suite 200, 288 North 1460 West
Clinic Bldg A, Suite 200, 288 North 1460 West
Clinic Bldg A, Suite 200, 288 North 1460 West

paragraph.content: Reportable condition notification: An initial report for Pertussis and Salmonellosis has been sent to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment and New Jersey Department of Health.

An initial case report was electronically submitted by your organization to determine if a patient has a public health reportable condition. The conditions of Pertussis and Salmonellosis were identified and are reportable conditions in Colorado and New Jersey. Additional information needs be submitted to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment for the report of Pertussis within 24 hours and for Salmonellosis within 7 days. The initial case report was forwarded to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment and the New Jersey Department of Health.
